## Overview

Director of Digital Marketing for [Landed Travel](https://landedtravel.com/), a luxury travel company specializing in tailor-made experiences throughout Latin America and Antarctica. I manage the company's [website](https://landedtravel.com/), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/landed.travel/), and all social media channels, and digital marketing strategy to connect discerning travelers with authentic, personalized experiences.

**Role:** Director of Digital Marketing

**Company:** [Landed Travel](https://landedtravel.com/)

**Focus:** Website management, social media, digital strategy, brand positioning

## What I Do

I lead all digital marketing for Landed—from managing the website and social media presence to developing content strategy and optimizing customer acquisition channels. My approach combines deep understanding of the luxury travel audience with data-driven optimization to build brand presence and drive results.

**Key areas:**

- Website management and optimization
- Social media strategy and content creation across all platforms
- Digital marketing strategy and execution
- Content storytelling for luxury destinations
- Performance analytics and ROI tracking

## What I'm Learning

Luxury marketing is about deep audience understanding—high-end travelers prioritize trust, authenticity, and personalization over traditional conversion tactics. Visual storytelling and authentic experiences drive engagement in ways traditional marketing cannot. Landed's regional expertise in Latin America and Antarctica creates unique competitive positioning in the luxury travel market.
